bool AnalysisStream::doAnalysis ( ProbeSetGroup &  psGroup,
IntensityMart &  iMart,
bool  doReport,
bool  alleleSummaryOnly = false 
) [virtual]

Do the analysis for a particular group of probe sets.

Parameters:
psGroup - Collection of probe sets to get probes from.
iMart - Object containing raw data values for all chips.
doReport - Should the quantification report object be called?
alleleSummaryOnly - A hack to get apt-probeset-genotype to output Axiom .summary files without genotyping. "People" decided that it was easier to do this than to get apt-probeset-summarize to read dual-channel CEL files.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.

std::string AnalysisStream::getAnalysisSpec (  )  [inline]

Get a formal description of each object in the analysis stream including chipstream objects, pm adjuster and quantification method.

The string description is of the form that SelfCreate objects would use to create themselves.

Returns:
- text description of objects and their state.
